item.description:
Hello everyone

This time, we will play tennis as our "SPORTS MEETUP"!

From those who have been playing for years to those who never held a tennis racket in their lives, everyone is welcome!

We will go to dinner or drink afterward in Porter or Davis Square, so even if you can't make it during the day, please feel free to join us at night.

Place:
Public tennis court near Porter Square T Station
(It's on Pemberton St, Cambridge, about 10 min walking distance from Porter T)
Please see the attached map for the direction.

If you have any questions, please e-mail kayo from the Meetup website. She will send her phone number to those who RSVP in case anyone has questions or gets lost.

Thank you!
kayo & NIC (The Prince of Tennis)
item.how_to_find_us: We will probably be the only Japanese tennis group on the courts.
item.name: Sports Meetup - Let's try tennis this time!
